text.section: An authority may bring a civil action to prevent, restrain, or enjoin the waste of or unlawful removal of any property from real property held by the authority.

section.section: An authority shall be made a party to any action or proceeding instituted for the purpose of setting aside title to property held by the authority or for the sale of property by the authority.
A hearing in any such proceeding may not be held until the authority is served in accordance with the Maryland Rules.
